name: Anime Fight
description:
Anime Fight is a classic game which is very popular worldwide. Our main character goku are the strongest and powerful Hero Warrior with incredible strenght. This Fighting game of super saiyan base is The best combat action game of 2021.

If you love anime fighting games... So this game (Anime Fight) is a challenge for your fight skills, and this is a gift for all anime fans.

FEATURES :


⚔️ Easy control and smooth gameplay
⚔️Multi Language (Español, Português, Le français, Italiano.. ).
⚔️ Responsive graphic
⚔️20+ Super Hero and Boss with amazing graphics stick.
⚔️ 5+ Powerful Maps.
⚔️Many Ninjas shinobi characters to play with.
⚔️ Full transformation and powerful "power ups".
⚔️Ultimate skill: amazing Kame - blow enemy with "KAI" energy.
⚔️Powerful skill: Great "Kai fighter" Energy ball from sky.
